name: NBCNews
text:
President Trump signs executive orders for coronavirus relief after negotiations with Democrats in Congress reach an impasse.

Democrats have promised to file a legal challenge, citing Congress' constitutional authority to determine federal spending. https://t.co/QNnQbpLfMU
